short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Beautiful Gradient With Every New Tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gradient Tabs is a beautiful chrome extension that shows a gradient pulled from the top popular gradients of Gradient Hunt each time you open a new tab. You can then copy the CSS code of each gradient and also save it to your likes webpage.
